last_episode_to_air.name: The Final
last_episode_to_air.overview: Three incredible chefs have cooked their way through the extraordinary culinary gauntlet to reach the Final, but which of them will be crowned as the first-ever winner?

name: Next Level Chef
overview: Three judges will preside over and mentor a group of talented chefs who will compete against each other across the three floors that test their culinary abilities.

episodes.name: The First Cook
episodes.overview: The world's toughest cooking competition is here! Gordon Ramsay fronts a series which sees 12 aspiring chefs face a cooking competition like no other...

episodes.name: Italian Week
episodes.overview: The tough culinary gauntlet now has 11 chefs remaining, and this time they must all tackle Italian cuisine - who will face the dreaded Cook Off in this edition?

episodes.name: Burger Week
episodes.overview: The competition is heating up as the 10 remaining cooks must make the perfect burger and chips, and Gordon Ramsay and his two fellow mentors put on a masterclass.

episodes.name: Family Favourites Week
episodes.overview: The remaining nine chefs take on Family Favourites Week - Gordon Ramsay had a surprise visitor, and things get tense in a low-budget Cook Off challenge…

episodes.name: Seafood Week
episodes.overview: There’s a Next Level Chef bombshell - the team competition is over! It’s now every chef for themselves, and the eight remaining cooks must tackle Seafood Week.

episodes.name: Fusion Week
episodes.overview: Only seven chefs remain in the competition, and this time it’s all about Fusion cooking, where they’ll be dealing with two types of cuisine and a surprise guest…

episodes.name: Semi-Final Week
episodes.overview: Six chefs have battled their way through many challenges to the Semi Final, but there are only three spots in the Final up for grabs... who will take those places?

episodes.name: The Final
episodes.overview: Three incredible chefs have cooked their way through the extraordinary culinary gauntlet to reach the Final, but which of them will be crowned as the first-ever winner?
